data.eml:eml: New data on Parasyrisca (Araneae: Gnaphosidae) from Mongolia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marusik, Yuri M., Fomichev, Alexander A., Omelko, Mikhail M. (2019): New data on Parasyrisca (Araneae: Gnaphosidae) from Mongolia. Zootaxa 4688 (2): 199-212, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4688.2.2
